entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
